name: 郭宏源
objective:
1. 資料表示法：定點系統 (Fixed Point System)，浮點系統 (Floating Point System)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計 (Microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtualmemory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
1.Data representation 
2.Logic operations
3.Command and control
4.Memory organization
5.Processor organization
schedule:
01.Computer Abstractions and Technology
02.Performance
03.Instructions: Language of the Computer
04.Operations of the Computer Hardware
05.RISC-V Addressing
06.Arrays versus Pointers
07.Arithmetic for Computers
08.Floating Point
09.Midterm Exam.
10.The Processor
11.Building a Datapath
12.Pipelined Datapath and Control
13.Data Hazards,Control Hazards
14.Large and Fast: Exploiting Memory Hierarchy
15.Caches Memory
16.Virtual Machines
17.Parallel Processors
18.Final Exam.
